history.text: Hi!
Do you like Ironman?
hello
i think he is definitely one of the cooler superheros
what about you?
Yes, he is so great. Tony Stark plays a great role in it
Also, his buddy James Rhodes in the movie is played by Terrance Howard.
It got really good reviews as well.
yeah rotten tomatoes gave it 94% so you know it has to be good
it is a good origin story too
Yes. Gwyneth Paltrow plays Pepper Potts in it as well. She is gorgeous.
the studios really messed up with Hulk and Spiderman so was good to see that one got right
I like stark and his head of security, cant remember his name but they play off each other really well
Jeff Bridges as the main bad guy Obadiah i thought was interesting but he played the double cross well
Yes! I love Robert Downey Jr. in this movie though. He is so funny.
i was worried at first, 2008 he wasn't doing so well with things
he really nailed the Tony Stark character though
Yes. Stark is the playboy billionaire who inherited the company from his late father.
Him and Rhodes head to Afghanistan during a tough time to promote their new weapon, the "Jericho" missile. After the demonstration, Stark and his convoy are ambused.
Stark is gravely injured and is abducted by terrorists.
Jon Favreau was the director and played in the movie, ive always liked his work
The terrorists tell him they want him to build them a jericho missile.
He is kept captive with Yinsen. Yinsen is a doctor who he befriends.
terrance howard was in it as the air force officer but i didnt really think he did a great job, im glad they replaced him for the follow on movies

After Stark escapes, his company holds a charity event. Stark is informed by a reporter that his company has been selling weapons to the terrorist group, The Ten Rings. They were using these weapns to attack the home vilage of Yinsen.

Stark is mortified. He learns that his assistant Stane has been going behind his back trafficking weapons to these illegals. He quickly comes up with a new and improved body suit idea that eventually turns into the Ironman.
He throws on his new armors and flies to Afghanistan where he saves the villagers.
On his way back, two fighter jets notice something in the sky and shoot him out of it. Rhodes finds out that the suit is in fact Tony.
Meanwhile, the Ten Rings gather all the pieces from when Tony escaped them and begin to converse with Stane about putting together their own suit.
Pepper ends up discovering that Stane is against Tony and had initially hired the Ten Rings to kill him
Potts meets with Agent Phil Coulson of S.H.I.E.L.D. to inform him about Stane.
i like how SHIELD spun off into its own television show
You need to only speak about Ironman to complete the HIT.
sorry, im new at this and just started two days ago
No problem!
You are doing fine. Just talk about the paragraphs to your left.
easy enough...thanks for the tip
Stane's scientists tried to replicate the ARC reactor technology which set up the main confrontation between him and Stark
He tries to steal Tony's reactor that is keeping him alive to use in his own suit he is making
Yes!
He gets it but Stark survives using older reactor and heads to Stark Industries
The main fight of the movie unfolds as Stark must defeat Stane and his more weaponized suit
Stark defeats him buying going higher than Stane's suit can withstand and it freezes crashing him back to the ground
Yes.
The massive electrical surge causes Stane and his armor to fall into the exploding reactor.
This kills him and the next day, Stark comes out and admits that he is Ironman.
being the brash billionaire that he is he just couldn't live behind a secret identity despite his new found appreciation for creating things other than weapons of war
Yes, exactly.
thanks for the tip on this!  thats so much easier
Have a good afternoon.

uid1response.feedback: The other user was a bit confused but I helped them along.
